Service Information Letter Briefing <[[https://performanceaccel.honeywell.com/Pilots/Newsletters/2017/Apr2018/SILApr18]]> Speed Constraints Issue Discovered on Honeywell NZ and Epic Aircraft with Autothrottle
Operators of some autothrottle-equipped aircraft reported that the ‘To’ waypoint speed constraint is not honored after switching from manual to automatic (FMS) speed mode...
